nodes.text: Recent Morrt Project Data-Gathering Results and Conclusions

The Recent Morrt Project Data-Gathering Results and Conclusions was a file written by Gara Petothel, the code slicer responsible for planting wrong information in the New Republic databanks; which led to the destruction of Talon Squadron. The file was a report on the findings of the Morrt-class parasite-droids, which Warlord Zsinj's forces secretly unleashed on the New Republic ships in order to trace their whereabouts. The file was sent to Admiral Apwar Trigit, captain of the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Implacable. After reading it, he immediately ordered preparations to attack Folor, where a New Republic training base was secretly located.
